name: 1968 Top 40 hits Multiple Choice Quiz | 1960s Music | 20 Questions

questions.text: 'Chain, chain, chain, chain, chain, chain, chain, chain, chain, chain of fools'
'I feel it in my fingers, I feel it in my toes'
'I can't stop this feelin' deep inside of me, girl, you just don't realize what you do to me'
options: Gary Puckett and The Union Gap

questions.text: 'I'd like to play a game, that is so much fun, and it's not so very hard to do,'
'Susan, looks like I am losin', I'm losin' my mind (losin' my mind), I'm wastin' my time'
'I want to be your lover, but your friend is all I've stayed. I'm only halfway to paradise'
'Sunshine, blue skies, please go away, my girl has found another and gone away'
'In the cool of the evening when ev'rything is gettin' kind of groovy,'
'Young girl, get out of my mind, my love for you is way out of line'
questions.correct: Gary Puckett and The Union Gap
questions.explanation: Gary Puckett and The Union Gap.

questions.text: 'And here's to you, Mrs. Robinson, Jesus loves you more than you will know (Wo, wo, wo)'
'Sittin' in the mornin' sun, I'll be sittin' when the evenin' come'
'I remember when I used to play shoot em up. (Shoot em up, bang, bang baby)'
'Now I don't hardly know her, but I think I could love her'
'Judy in disguise, well, that's what you are,'
questions.correct: John Fred and His Playboy Band
questions.explanation: John Fred and His Playboy Band.

questions.text: 'All the world over, so easy to see, people everywhere just wanna be free'
'If I had told her that I loved her, she would have stayed till who knows when'
options: Gary Puckett and The Union Gap

questions.text: 'A long time ago, when the earth was green, there were more kinds of animals than you've ever seen;'
'Sometimes I'm right and I can be wrong, my own beliefs are in my song'
'I think it's so groovy now that people are finally getting together'
'Tiptoe to the window, by the window that is where I'll be, come tiptoe through the tulips with me!'
